title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When choosing SWT.MULTI in the SWT example ControlExample under the Text tab, a beeping sound is heard. Clicking on other buttons also produces the same bell sound.
EB: When choosing SWT.MULTI in the SWT example ControlExample under the Text tab, no beeping sound should be heard. Clicking on other buttons should not produce any bell sound.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Launch the SWT example ControlExample.
2. Navigate to the Text tab.
3. Click on the Styles SWT.SINGLE.
4. Click on the Styles SWT.MULTI again.
